data.title: Swinburne University, Sarawak, Malaysia
data.meta_description: Located 10 minutes from the city centre and surrounded by commercial and residential areas with easy access to supermarkets, restaurants, banks, malls and more.
data.meta_site_name: Swinburne University, Sarawak, Malaysia | Swinburne is a world-class university in Malaysia that focuses on creating future-ready graduates, innovation, and producing research with real-world impact.
data.text:
Where is Swinburne?

The Malaysian campus is located in the heart of Kuching, Sarawak and is a mere 10 minutes from the airport and 10 minutes to the city-centre. Kuching is the capital of Sarawak, the largest state in Malaysia and is well connected through daily direct flights from the nationâ€™s capital, Kuala Lumpur, including major cities such as Penang, Johor Bharu, and Kota Kinabalu.
